description: Write a class called `Rectangle` with __init__(width, height) and a method area() that returns the area. Then create a function called `get_area(width, height)` that creates a Rectangle and returns its area.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
notes: Implement the Create a Simple Class problem correctly
Consider edge cases and boundary conditions
Test your solution with various inputs
hints: Start with the base case or simple scenario
Build up to the complete solution step by step
